alert.note: Alert for Ringgold; Taylor; Union (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 17 at 11:26PM CDT until September 18 at 12:00AM CDT by NWS DesMoines
info.description: The National Weather Service in Des Moines has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Union County in south central Iowa... Ringgold County in south central Iowa... Eastern Taylor County in southwestern Iowa... * Until midnight CDT. * At 1125 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Clearfield, or 11 miles west of Mount Ayr, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Delphos around 1130 PM CDT. Benton around 1135 PM CDT. Diagonal around 1140 PM CDT. Mount Ayr and Mt Ayr Municipal Airport around 1145 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Shannon City. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
